item.title: NPC Mapping! Updated!
item.dc:creator: @ZhaR ZhaR
item.description:
@ZhaR wrote:

Originally not created by me.

public void map(String s)
{

    File f = new File("./autospawn.cfg");

    try{
        BufferedReader buff = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(f));
        PrintWriter pw = new PrintWriter(new FileWriter(f, true));
        String line = buff.readLine();
        while(line != null){
            line = buff.readLine();

        }
        if(line == null){
            pw.println("spawn = " + s + "	" + absX + "	" + absY + "	0	=SUM(" + absX + "+3)	=SUM(" + absY + "+3)	=SUM(" + absX + "-3)	=SUM(" + absX + "-3)	2");
            pw.flush();
        }
        buff.close();
        pw.close();
    }
    catch(Exception e){}

}

I updated so the NPC will walk 3 sqares left/right/up/down. If you want change to any number you want at //=SUM(" + absX + "+3) in all 4, or 2.

What I need now is a code that will make ALL NCPS not go throught walls and tables? Can someone post?

Read full topic
